divs: sighting detailsme and my neighbors were watching fire works last night. it was still kinda light out and we all just looked up & outta where over our neighbors roof a big glowing orange reddish ufo appeared over my neighbors roof top. we said what the fu** is that!!! multiple neighbors witnessed this craft it was like a fire ball in the mddel and a saucer\triangel shape on the bottom. you could see the out line of the ball on top and circular\triangel shape below and it was raidating. it hovered for a minuetand & i sent my sister in 4 a camera and it started moving down my street. i followed it it went into the clouds and tried to hide its self as a cloud. but you could still see the red glow in the lil bit of clouds it was in. when it came out the clouds it shrunk majorly in size and it looked like a baby baby cloud flying down the street but you could still see orange reddish craft inside. we took some pictures i have to down load the to the computer & hop they come out. the pics we took was of the craft disgusied in the baby cloud. so ill have some pics hopefully a.s.a.p 4 you. i need the usb to download. hopefully it looks good. me and numerous witnesses followed this craft down the other block & it dissappeared. i took off when i sent my sister in the house for the camers and i was following it. like it noticed us following it and "ran" off. and it was weird how we noticed it because the fire works were on the opposite side down a few blocks. outt no where all 5 of us just turned and looked and said what the f*ck is that. no chance in hell it was a plane or a fire work!!!!!! a plane woulda fell out da sky at that low low heigh! and no fire work is hovering and cloaking its self!!! we werw all blown away and amazed and excited!!!
Summary: reddish orange glowin ufo right above roof top. hovered turned traveled & hid in clouds still moving.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
